Dimensional Merchant: In order to seal or unseal the Power Shirt, you must have a *Power Shirt or a Sealed Power Shirt in the character's inventory.* %% A Sealed Power Shirt can be transferred to another character within the account through the Dimensional Merchant. *But, when the seal is removed on a Sealed Power Shirt, you can no longer use seal/unseal.* [npc_%objectId%_Multisell 32479|Seal/unseal Power Shirt.] [npc_%objectId%_Chat 0|Back]
